segments.text: I live in an apartment downtown .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's convenient , but ... how much crime is there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not much . But there is a lot of traffic . I can't stand the noise sometimes ! Where do you live ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: . I have a house in the suburbs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I bet it's really quiet . But is there much to do there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , not much . In fact , nothing ever really happens . That's the trouble .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey . Let's trade places one weekend !
segments.speaker: S2
